entry.title: [GLOBAL][Support] - Help Center update
entry.content:
Jun 13, 18:39 UTC
Completed - The scheduled maintenance has been completed.

Jun 13, 17:37 UTC
Update - The current maintenance is still in progress and will take more time than expected.
Below you can find the new end time.

End time : 13/06/2023 19:00 UTC

Jun 13, 16:30 UTC
In progress - Scheduled maintenance is currently in progress. We will provide updates as necessary.

Jun 13, 14:58 UTC
Scheduled - Start time : 13/06/2023 16:30 UTC
End time : 13/06/2023 18:00 UTC
Service impact : Help Center access could be degraded, and Netherlands help center not accessible
Service improvement : As part of our continuous improvement policy, we will do an update on the Help Center
Workaround : Help Center should remain accessible on all other languages. In parallel, the customer panel (https://www.ovh.com/manager) remain accessible, you can create your tickets from there.
If you have a Business or Enterprise level of support, your dedicated phone number is available to reach you technical advisor in case of emergency.
You can also access our documentation directly on our GitHub repository : https://github.com/ovh/docs/tree/develop/pages

entry.title: [Global][Support] - Issues contacting Support
entry.content:
Jun 8, 16:30 UTC
Resolved - Start time : 07/06/2023 06:32 UTC
End time : 07/06/2023 15:11 UTC

On Wednesday June 7th at 8:27 AM (CET), a network malfunction impacted the VoIP services of some of our customers.

OVHcloud technical teams immediately intervened to identify the cause of the incident and resolve it. Impacted services have been restored on 07/06/2023 15:11 UTC and are now operational.

You can contact our customer service on 1007 or open a support ticket from your Help Center.

We apologize for any inconvenience this may has caused. We will update our support pages with new information as soon as available.

Jun 7, 15:11 UTC
Update - Impacted services are operational.
We will continue to monitor the situation for the time being.
Further explanation will be post here.
We apologized for the inconvenience.

Jun 7, 13:35 UTC
Monitoring - A fix has been implemented and we are monitoring the results.

Jun 7, 12:32 UTC
Update - All technical teams are hands on impacted services.
We are doing our very best to resolved the issue.

Jun 7, 09:44 UTC
Update - Our technicians are still currently working on in order to fix this situation.

Jun 7, 08:21 UTC
Investigating - Start time : 07/06/2023 06:32 UTC
Service impact : You may have difficulty contacting your customer service on 1007.
Related Incident : https://web-cloud.status-ovhcloud.com/incidents/8hqngk137spw
Ongoing actions : Our technical teams are working on the issue. Update will be post as significant progress is made.
Workaround : You can call long number 09 72 10 1007 (only for France) or open a support ticket from your Help Center.

entry.title: [CA][Support] - Call support
entry.content:
Mar 26, 19:51 UTC
Resolved - Start Time : 25/03/2023 23:00 UTC
End Time : 26/03/2023 18:54 UTC
Root cause : A delay on a voice gateway caused the issue
Our technical teams resolved the issue. All impacted services are now operational.

Mar 26, 18:54 UTC
Monitoring - Ongoing actions : All support numbers are now reachable through English and French language options.
Our teams are currently monitoring the situation.

Mar 26, 18:33 UTC
Investigating - Start time : 25/03/2023 23:00 UTC
Service impact : Some customers who try to contact us through our support numbers (1-855-685-5463 and the Premium number), won't be able to get through our support if they chose the French language option.
Customers will need to choose the English language option to in order to contact our support.
Ongoing actions : Investigating
Our technical teams are working on the issue. Update will be post as significant progress is made.
